concept.description: Reports :DEFINES_DEPENDENCY relations between :BoundedContext nodes. Adding relations is to be provided by project specific rules.
concept.cypher: MATCH (dependentBC:JMolecules:DDD:BoundedContext)-[:DEFINES_DEPENDENCY]->(dependencyBC:JMolecules:DDD:BoundedContext) RETURN dependentBC AS SourceBoundedContext, dependencyBC AS TargetBoundedContext ORDER BY SourceBoundedContext.name, TargetBoundedContext.name

constraint.description: Reports all fields of :ValueObject nodes that are not final, including those coming from parent classes.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (valueObject:JMolecules:DDD:ValueObject)-[:DECLARES]->(f:Field) WHERE NOT exists(f.final) OR f.final = false RETURN valueObject AS ValueObject, f AS MutableField UNION MATCH (valueObject:JMolecules:DDD:ValueObject)-[:EXTENDS|IMPLEMENTS*]->(c)-[:DECLARES]->(f:Field) WHERE NOT exists(f.final) OR f.final = false RETURN valueObject AS ValueObject, f AS MutableField

constraint.description: Checks that the id field of an entity (identifiable) is final.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (identifiable:JMolecules:DDD:Identifiable)-[:HAS_IDENTITY]->(f:Identity:Field) WHERE NOT exists(f.final) OR f.final = false RETURN identifiable AS Identifiable, f AS MutableIdentity

constraint.description: Checks that dependencies between :BoundedContext nodes exist only where allowed.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (dependentBC:JMolecules:DDD:BoundedContext)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyBC:JMolecules:DDD:BoundedContext), (dependentBC)-[:CONTAINS]->(t1:Type), (dependencyBC)-[:CONTAINS]->(t2:Type), (t1)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(t2) WHERE dependentBC <> dependencyBC AND NOT EXISTS((:BoundedContext{name: dependentBC.name})-[:DEFINES_DEPENDENCY]->(:BoundedContext{name: dependencyBC.name})) RETURN dependentBC AS SourceBoundedContext, dependencyBC AS TargetBoundedContext, t1 AS SourceType, t2 AS TargetType ORDER BY SourceBoundedContext.name, TargetBoundedContext.name
